documents.document: Dan Russell of @Google endorsing Ask a Librarian services as great sources for info seekers. Woo hoo! #FutureofLearning @SILibraries
Dan Russell of Google: We need to teach people to ask questions to better assess accuracy of info online. #FutureofLearning @SILibraries
#Informacy = being literate about information. Better skills needed to judge accuracy/reliability of info. #FutureofLearning @SILibraries
~90% of users don't know Ctrl-F "find" function, which greatly impacts their ability/accuracy to find info on a webpage. #FutureofLearning
Dan Russell: 92% of people say they're confident in their online searching abilities, though most do it only once/day. #FutureofLearning
Even Google's Űber Tech Lead Dan Russell says users need guides to actually find what they're looking for online! #FutureofLearning
Watching Daniel Russell from Google talk about The Future of Learning, via @SILibraries. Join in here: https://t.co/lscrH9wxRJ
